doc:
Lawrence Gilliard Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lawrence_Gilliard_Jr. 0 Lawrence Gilliard Jr. (born September 22, 1971) is an American character actor who has appeared in films, television series and theatre. He portrayed D'Angelo Barksdale on the HBO drama series The Wire, a role which earned him critical acclaim. He is also known for his role as Bob Stookey in the AMC horror drama The Walking Dead. He is in the cast of David Simon's HBO TV series, The Deuce, that premiered in September 2017. Lawrence_Gilliard_Jr. ( born September_22_,_1971 ) is an_American_character_actor who has_appeared in films , television_series_and_theatre . He portrayed D'Angelo_Barksdale on the_HBO_drama_series The_Wire , a_role which earned him critical_acclaim . He is_also_known for his_role as Bob_Stookey in the_AMC_horror_drama The_Walking_Dead . He is in the_cast of David_Simon 's_HBO_TV_series , The_Deuce , that premiered in September_2017 .
